titleStmt.title: Baptism discovered plainly & faithfully according to the word of God. Wherein is set forth the glorious pattern of our blessed saviour Jesus Christ, the pattern of all believers in his subjection to baptism. Together, with the example of thousands who were baptized after they believed. By John Norcott, late servant of Jesus Christ, and of his church. The third edition, corrected by Will. Kiffin, and Rich. Claridge. With an appendix by another hand.
titleStmt.author: Norcott, John, d. 1676.

titleStmt.title: Baptism discovered plainly & faithfully according to the word of God. Wherein is set forth the glorious pattern of our blessed saviour Jesus Christ, the pattern of all believers in his subjection to baptism. Together, with the example of thousands who were baptized after they believed. By John Norcott, late servant of Jesus Christ, and of his church. The third edition, corrected by Will. Kiffin, and Rich. Claridge. With an appendix by another hand.
titleStmt.author: Norcott, John, d. 1676.
Claridge, Richard, 1649-1723.
Kiffin, William, 1649-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Rotterdam, and now re-printed at London, by the assigns of Widow Norcott, and sold by Will. Marshal at the Bible in Newgate street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
